Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_01>I appreciate the backup!<sp:5:1:0> I got into a bit
of trouble...
SavedLv3_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Whoa!<sp:5:1:0> You must be the real deal!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>A lot of weapons decayed after the
Upheaval. Most folks don't know what
to do about it...
But I figured it out!<sp:0:4:0>If you combine <clr:0000>monster materials<clr:ffff> and a
<clr:0000>decayed weapon<clr:ffff>—boom! Much improved.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Great idea, right? Just a little tip from me
to you, free of charge.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>It's been ages since I've seen a fight
like that!<sp:5:1:0> I'd sure like to spar with
you someday.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>How am I supposed to run a business with
all the monsters around nowadays?
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>You really helped me out.<sp:5:0:0> You've got
some skill!
SavedLv1_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Thank you! That takes a load off!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Thank you. <sp:5:0:0>Running away is harder with
these old knees.
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm ready to part with a lot of rupees!
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Don't be shy! I'll buy all sorts of things.
ShopGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Now, back to business. I've moved on to
the merchant life, after all. <sp:5:0:0>And I can
assure you that I offer great prices!
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Thanks to you, we're all sold out today!<sp:5:0:0>
Ahaha! I feel so light!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Thanks to you, I'm all cleaned out! I don't
have other goods, but do you want a peek
at my upcoming stock?
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Gear that's <clr:0000>made of metal <clr:ffff>attracts
<clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>. Zap! <sp:0:4:0>Hearing that tell-tale rumble of thunder is
a good reminder to take off any metal
<clr:0000>gear<clr:ffff> as quick as you can.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you head <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, you'll reach
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> It's just past the
<clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>They make first-rate weapons, but I bet
the Upheaval's decay got to them too.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>That was terrifying!<sp:5:1:0> I don't think even I
could have taken down one of those!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Even the best <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> break if you keep
using 'em.

But did you know some <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> are at
their strongest right before they break?

It's almost like they're pushing
themselves to wring out the last
scrap of power they have.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Make sure you always have plenty
of <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> you can use. You want
backups...and backups of your backups.
You don't want to get caught in a fight
without a weapon, do you?
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Did you know some <clr:0000>weapons<clr:ffff> are at their
strongest right before they break?

It's almost like they're pushing
themselves to wring out the last
scrap of power they have.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>If you head <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, you'll reach
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> It's just past the
<clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>.
That's where you'll find the <clr:0000>Zora<clr:ffff>. They're
water folk. And if you need armor or
weapons, their blacksmiths are top-rate.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>But I bet even their weapons decayed
after the Upheaval.
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? You're going to sell me something?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Some folks say <clr:0000>weapons <clr:ffff>made out of
<clr:0000>wood <clr:ffff>are dull and fragile,<sp:5:1:0> but it's all
about how you use 'em.
If you light one on <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff> and chuck it at an
enemy? <sp:5:0:0>Fwoom! <sp:5:0:0>And if you're in the dark,
you can use it as a <clr:0000>torch<clr:ffff> in a pinch.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>You just need a bit of clever thinking.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Notice>That appearance... <sp:5:1:0>That demeanor...<sp:5:1:0>
I can tell you're a man of great skill!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But even the <clr:0000>weapons <clr:ffff>of a master like
you won't last forever, so make sure you
always have back-ups.
Getting caught without a <clr:0000>weapon <clr:ffff>might be
the last mistake you ever make!
ShopTalk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0801>All right!<sp:5:0:0> Anything else you want to see?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>The <clr:0000>materials<clr:ffff> used to make <clr:0000>equipment<clr:ffff>
like shields and weapons give them
different characteristics.
For example, anything <clr:0000>made of metal <clr:ffff>is
going to attract <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>. Zap!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hearing that tell-tale rumble of thunder is
a good reminder to take off any metal
<clr:0000>gear<clr:ffff> as quick as you can.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you set <clr:0000>fire<clr:ffff> to a <clr:0000>wooden weapon<clr:ffff>
and whack a monster with it—fwoom!
It'll go up like a torch.
And speaking of <clr:0000>torches<clr:ffff>, that same
weapon can light your way in the dark.<sp:5:1:0>
Just gotta use your noggin!
Com_Talk_02d: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Thank you! Good deal all around, I think.
Com_Talk_05: <sp:3:0:2:0001>I'll give you good prices. Mark my words!
ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Well, I've got to get back to business.


You remind me too much of myself—it's
distracting! Now shoo!
ShopGoodBye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you change your mind, just give me
a shout!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>If you combine <clr:0000>monster materials<clr:ffff> and a
<clr:0000>decayed weapon<clr:ffff>, the weapon turns into
something you can use!
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry>Hey! You don't have enough <clr:0000>rupees<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
I might be laid-back, but I take my
business seriously.
Com_Talk_09:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0301><clr:ffff><snd:Sad>It looks like your pouch is full.<sp:5:1:0> Come back
when you've made some room!
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>I've got a good collection here.<sp:5:0:0> Take a
nice, long look.
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0001>So, how many do you want to sell?
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I don't know how to say this properly,
so I'll just come out with it—<sp:5:0:0>you strike
me as an extraordinary fellow.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>I should know. I was once a marvel of
a man. Strong as an ox, training hours a
day to master the ways of war...
Then my life took a left turn, and I ended
up here, hawking my wares on the side of
the road.
Well, no matter how rusty my sword skills
get, I'm still a good judge of people.

Oh... <sp:5:0:0>That was probably more backstory
than you wanted!

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Sorry about that. I suppose I just got
caught up in your aura.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Hey now. <sp:5:1:0>If you want to sell the clothes
you're wearing, take them off first.
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>So you walk around like that all day,
just exuding strength and vigor?

Tell you what! If you ever want an
old swordsman's advice, I'm happy to
share what I know.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Reflecting an attack can create an
opening to attack your opponent. Practice
with your <clr:0000>shield <clr:ffff>to use tricks like this!
And have you heard? Some folks ride
their <clr:0000>shields<clr:ffff> to surf down hills. Wild!
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're willing to go shopping in this
weather,<sp:5:0:0> you deserve the good stuff!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting><clr:0000>Shields<clr:ffff> aren't just for blocking an attack
or defending yourself.

You can also reflect attacks, creating
openings to attack your opponent.
Your shield can do offense AND defense!<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I've even heard some folks ride their
<clr:0000>shields<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>surf <clr:ffff>down hills. Wild!
Com_Talk_11_c: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>You'll be happy with that—I guarantee it!
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Good timing!<sp:5:0:0> I could use a little
monster-fighting help!
